repos_data.description: Empowering People Ethically with the leading open source alternative to Google Analytics that gives you full control over your data. Matomo lets you easily collect data from websites & apps and visualise this data and extract insights. Privacy is built-in. Liberating Web Analytics. Star us on Github? +1.  And we love Pull Requests!
Building a modern alternative to Salesforce, powered by the community.
